name: Jewish Community Center of San Francisco
description: The mission of the Jewish Community Center of San Francisco (JCCSF) is to enrich life, build identity and promote the development of meaningful bonds within the community. We provide high quality experiences through a mix of formal and informal recreational, educational, and cultural activities. The JCCSF's core program areas include: Youth Programming, Fitness & Wellness, Adult Enrichment, Special Services (community service projects, inclusion programming) and Signature Programming (Arts & Ide
